title: [Large-scale] Simulation-Based Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Obstetrics and Gynecology

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic obstetrics/gynecology clinical knowledge and practical experience
context.additional_context: Training in low-income country settings using simulation equipment and mobile devices.

learning_goals: Perform high-risk pregnancy management skills (e.g., hemorrhage, umbilical cord prolapse) with 90% accuracy through childbirth simulation scenarios
Improve role allocation and communication skills during obstetric emergencies by over 80% via team-based simulation training
Acquire technical proficiency to achieve 100% success rate within 5 minutes in VR-based neonatal resuscitation simulation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
